message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.RO, cs.LG, cs.AI. 

The paper proposes a method for automatic leaf segmentation in 3D plant point clouds using filtering and facet region growing. This involves computer vision (CV) techniques such as filtering and segmentation, as well as graphics (GR) techniques such as facet over-segmentation. The method is also relevant to robotics (RO) and machine learning (LG) as it can facilitate automatic traits estimation and has potential for use in agricultural engineering. Additionally, the paper mentions the use of a joint filtering operator, which suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence (AI) techniques.
